title: Geraint Thomas ‘Gutted’ with Rod Ellingworth Departure from Ineos Grenadiers
content:
Thomas and Ellingworth have worked together for 20 years but will part ways as Ellingworth leaves amidst a time of big change for the British team.

Read the full article at Geraint Thomas ‘Gutted’ with Rod Ellingworth Departure from Ineos Grenadiers on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
